## Calculate market Portfolio
```{r}
Market_RET <- DS.monthly %>% 
  select(Id, ym, RET.USD, MV.USD) %>% 
  group_by(ym) %>% 
  mutate(MRET = weighted.mean(RET.USD, coalesce(MV.USD, 0), na.rm = T)) %>% 
  ungroup %>% 
  arrange(ym, Id)

Market_RET_ym <- Market_RET %>% 
  group_by(ym) %>% 
  summarise(Market_RET = mean(MRET))
```
